#
# Parameters of the Reference Coordination Geometries
#
# Format:
#
# Name CentralAtom Atom1 Atom2 Atom3 ...
#
# where:
# Name => Polyhedral symbol (when defined). This is taken from IUPAC Red book.
# CentralAtom => <Symbol>,<x-coord>,<y-coord>,<z-coord>
#
# CN =2
L-2 Du,1.0000,0.0000,1.0000 Du,0.0000,0.0000,1.0000 Du,2.0000,0.0000,1.0000

#
